SEARCH
Package DAO

Class ProductDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.AbstractDAO<Product>
DAO.ProductDAO
public class ProductDAO extends AbstractDAO<Product>
This is a ProductDAO class that handles the database operations for products. It extends the AbstractDAO class and inherits its methods. It uses the Connection class to interact with the database.

    • isNameOwnedByProductId

      public boolean isNameOwnedByProductId(String name, int productId)
      This method checks if the given name is owned by a product with the given id.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the product.
      productId - The id of the product.
      Returns:
      true if the name is owned by the product, false otherwise.
